name: Above The Haze, Below My Mania Craze
description:
_
Body painting using eyebrow pencils, eyeshadows, and powder for a Halloween themed photoshoot back in 2015.

The original selfie was taken on October 31, 2015, using iPhone 6 camera. Retouched and edited on October 2021.

mp4, seamless loop
4.2 MB
1080 × 1440
Meant to be viewed on smaller screens

_
One of the rare selfies I took as part of my archiving moments experienced in the middle of the (still ongoing) therapy for my Bipolar Disorder. Captured in my car, at a parking lot… a discreet lucidity in a frame.
